name: ORS National Population Report
description:
This report displays the total population figures for each Establishment

NAT0001 - v00.00.01 Last Modified: 12/07/2018

dataset.name: Population
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME AS LAST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME AS FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID AS AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID) + 2, LENGTH(AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION)) AS UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('ACI', 'ASI', 'AGI', 'AYI', 'BFI', 'BAI', 'BWI', 'BMI', 'BHI', 'BSI', 'BLI', 'BXI', 'BZI', 'BCI', 'BNI', 'BRI', 'CFI', 'CWI', 'CDI', 'CLI', 'CKI', 'DAI', 'DTI', 'DNI', 'DGI', 'DWI', 'DHI', 'DMI', 'DVI', 'ESI', 'EWI', 'EYI', 'EEI', 'EXI', 'FSI', 'FMI', 'FDI', 'FBI', 'FHI', 'FKI', 'FNI', 'GHI', 'GTI', 'ZZGHI', 'GPI', 'GNI', 'GMI', 'HDI', 'HVI', 'HOI', 'HPI', 'HII', 'HEI', 'HBI', 'HHI', 'HLI', 'HMI') OR 'All' IN ('ACI', 'ASI', 'AGI', 'AYI', 'BFI', 'BAI', 'BWI', 'BMI', 'BHI', 'BSI', 'BLI', 'BXI', 'BZI', 'BCI', 'BNI', 'BRI', 'CFI', 'CWI', 'CDI', 'CLI', 'CKI', 'DAI', 'DTI', 'DNI', 'DGI', 'DWI', 'DHI', 'DMI', 'DVI', 'ESI', 'EWI', 'EYI', 'EEI', 'EXI', 'FSI', 'FMI', 'FDI', 'FBI', 'FHI', 'FKI', 'FNI', 'GHI', 'GTI', 'ZZGHI', 'GPI', 'GNI', 'GMI', 'HDI', 'HVI', 'HOI', 'HPI', 'HII', 'HEI', 'HBI', 'HHI', 'HLI', 'HMI')) AND AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID <> 'ZZGHI' AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER(SELECT username from context_)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, AGY_LOC_ID, DESCRIPTION, UNIT_DESCRIPTION_4_SHORT FROM dataset_base_)
